snippet: The state is planning a dual-track voting system allowing people who register without proof of citizenship to vote for federal offices but not for state or local ones, officials said.
abstract: Arizona is planning dual-track voting system allowing people who register without submitting proof of citizenship to vote for federal offices but not state or local offices.
lead_paragraph: The state is planning a dual-track voting system allowing people who register without proof of citizenship to vote for federal offices but not for state or local ones, officials said.

headline.main: Arizona: Ballots Will Have Two-Track System
headline.print_headline: Arizona: Ballots Will Have Two-Track System
